*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $5.00). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
**Promo code will become available via email by December 4, 2018. Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only. No minimum purchase is required to receive the 10% off. Purchase must be made November 20-30, 2018. Limit one promo code per account. One time use only. Discount not valid on furniture or special orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires November 30, 2018.
